title: She Ra (2018) is Worth Your Time
author: Five by Five Takes
comment: "if you've seen it and you wanna watch it again, do it" Me, who just finished my 6th she-ra rewatch last night: "all right let's go again."
omg i can't get over how INCREDIBLE the voice acting is in this show????  aj's voice acting for catra in particular is honestly one the best performances i've ever heard 😭
When you've seen corridors and save the cat 10 times and still cry over it every time, you know the show is worth it

I'm not American and I was born in the 2000s, so the first time I had ever heard of Shera was when the first promotional images for the reboot came out and people were getting up in arms about Adora's design. I thought of people's reactions as being very exaggerated, but I didn't give the show much thought after until back in July, when I rejoined tumblr and noticed people talking about it.
I like how I watch this even though I already know that She Ra was worth watching....
description:
in case you can't tell, this show makes me go insane.


shoutout to rea, who inspired some last minute edits that made this video what it was
